artist: Natori Shunsen; Published by Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: head and shoulders of man in maroon garment; shadowy grey cityscape in background
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text: Fifth design of the supplement set. Based on Ichikawa Sadanji II as Marubashi Chūya in the scene Honmaru-jō gaihoribata of the play Keian Taiheiki 慶安太平記　本丸城外堀端 (Record of the Great Pacification of the Keian Period), performed at the Meiji Theater, April 1923.
title: The Actor Ichikawa Sadanji II as Marubashi Chūya
